events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review your qualifications soon.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience and skills.
A recruiter from our Engineering talent acquisition team has been assigned to assist you throughout the recruitment process.
Your profile has passed the initial screening stage, and we are impressed with your engineering background.
Thank you for your prompt response to our screening questions; your enthusiasm for the software developer role is clear.
We have scheduled your technical interview for May 10th at 2 PM to discuss your development skills in depth.
